name: cascade-excel-addin
description: AI-powered Excel add-in for finance professionals

scripts.dev: start "Backend" cmd /k "cd backend && npm run dev" && start "Add-in" cmd /k "cd excel-addin && npm run dev"
scripts.build: npm run build:addin && npm run build:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:addin && npm run test:backend

author: Cascade Team
